Public Member Functions

bool operator() (ID3DXEffect *pEffect, D3DXHANDLE constantHandle)

Detailed Description

Sets the "MaxAnisotropy" constant.

Shaders can read this constant to allow users to define the anisotropy value to be used via the TEXTURE_FILTER graphics setting.
